title: Pixel Stand no longer fast charges Pixel 4 XL after updating to Android 11
content:
My Pixel 4 XL used to charge within 2 hours via my Pixel Stand (and this is even from 5% to 100%).

Ever since I updated to Android 11, it takes FOREVER to charge now via the Pixel Stand. In fact yesterday it was at 50% and said it had 3 hours to go still.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
